project.description:
Build bll-freebsd7-baseonly target
Run Unit test testbase
Create directory structure needed for the Tarball
Create tar.gz file
Call the FTP tarball job which copies the Tarball over to Martin
Jenkins Node(s): 10.1.20.18
Wait 20 minutes to stagger builds (1200) seconds.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: major minor version TODO: get this from a file

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_BUILD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Flag whether or not this build is a release build candidate. If a build is a release candidate then STC_CR license/entitlement will be disabled

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Should be either RELEASE, Alpha or Beta

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo LD_LIBRARY_PATH is $LD_LIBRARY_PATH # rm -rf $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/API
if [ "$RELEASE_BUILD" = "true" ]; then cp -f $WORKSPACE/framework/bll/core/include/licensing/ga_release/ControlledReleaseCheck.h $WORKSPACE/framework/bll/core/include/licensing/ControlledReleaseCheck.h fi
python genSln.py

if [ "$BUILD_RUN_UNITTEST" = "true" ]; then echo $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR cd $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR:.: python $WORKSPACE/framework/tools/testRunner/testRunner.py testbase fi

cd $BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR export SOURCE_OS=FreeBSD71 cp -f $WORKSPACE/framework/bll/core/install/release/ILVersion.xml ILVersion.xml python $WORKSPACE/Build_Scripts/Scripts/ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --createpropfile=yes --runsetver=yes --updatepkgindextcl=yes --updatespirenttestcentertcl=yes --updatestclibtcl=yes --updateilversionxml=yes

if [ -d Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION ]; then echo "Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION exists!" else mkdir Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION fi cd Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION
if [ -d Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 ]; then echo "Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 exists!" else mkdir Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 fi cd Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71/ # rm -r $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD/* cp -rf $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/API $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 # cp -rf $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/HelpInfo $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 cp -f $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/HelpInfo.zip $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 cp -f $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/Resource.zip $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 cp -rf $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/Templates $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 cp -rf $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/Model $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 cp -f $WORKSPACE/framework/bll/core/install/release/ILVersion.xml $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71 cp -f $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/stcbll.ini $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71
for file in .tcl .pl .pm .py .a .so .xml .so* ;do if ( ls $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/*$file >/dev/null) then echo "$file file exists!" cp -f $WORKSPACE/$BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/*$file $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71/ else echo "There are no files matching the pattern: $file to copy!" fi done
for file in test*.xml correct*.xml source*.xml test*.tcl correct*.tcl unused*.tcl lib*.a stcFtpd.tcl tclCmdline.tcl tclFtpd.tcl ;do if ( ls $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71/$file >/dev/null) then echo "$file file exists!" rm -f $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Spirent_TestCenter_Application_FreeBSD71/$file else echo "There are no files matching the pattern: $file to delete!" fi done
sudo chmod a+rx $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION sudo chmod -R o+rw $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION sudo chmod -R a+rw $WORKSPACE/Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION

rm -f Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD71_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar if [ -f Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD71_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz ]; then echo removing Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD71_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz rm -f Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD71_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz else echo Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD71_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar.gz does not exist. fi tar cvf Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD71_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar Spirent_TestCenter_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION gzip Spirent_TestCenter_Auto_FreeBSD71_$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION.tar echo "Finished creating tar files"
